title: Identification of adaptable sunflower (Helianthus annuus L.) genotypes using yield performance and multiple-traits index
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Fiseha Baraki, Zenawi Gebregergis, Yirga Belay, Goitom Teame, Zerabruk Gebremedhin, Muez Berhe, Dawit Fisseha, Goitom Araya, Gebremedhn Gebregergs
